verification.title: Verifikasi Akun
verification.description: Verify your identity to access private areas and gain more trust
verification.verifiedDescription: Your account has been successfully verified
verification.submitSuccessDescription: The moderation team will review it soon
verification.subtitle: Verifikasi identitas Anda untuk mengakses area privat dan mendapat kepercayaan lebih
verification.fullAccess: Anda memiliki akses penuh ke semua area forum termasuk bagian privat.
verification.inReviewInfo: Permintaan verifikasi Anda telah dikirim dan sedang ditinjau oleh tim moderasi. Anda akan menerima notifikasi saat disetujui.
verification.followSteps: Ikuti langkah-langkah ini untuk memverifikasi akun Anda
verification.step1Desc: Buat kode unik yang harus Anda tulis di kertas bersama nama pengguna (@{username}) dan tanggal hari ini.
verification.step2Desc: Ambil foto yang jelas saat Anda memegang kertas bertuliskan:
verification.step3Desc: Unggah foto ke layanan seperti Imgur, ImgBB atau sejenisnya, dan tempel URL di sini:

favorites.emptyDesc: Click the heart on any thread to add it to your favorites

legal.cookieBannerDescription: We use essential cookies for site functionality and optional cookies to improve your experience. By clicking "Accept all", you consent to the use of all cookies. You can manage your preferences at any time.

errors.unexpectedError: Terjadi kesalahan yang tidak terduga. Tim kami telah diberitahu dan sedang bekerja untuk memperbaikinya.
errors.step1: Coba muat ulang halaman atau bersihkan cache browser
errors.includeErrorId: dan sertakan ID kesalahan jika tersedia

contact.title: Kontak
contact.sendMessageDesc: Fill out the form and we'll respond as soon as possible
contact.name: Nama
contact.subject: Subjek
contact.beforeContactDesc: We recommend checking our FAQ section where you can find answers to the most common questions.
contact.moderationNote: Jika pertanyaan Anda tentang moderasi atau laporan, gunakan sistem pelaporan bawaan forum untuk respons yang lebih cepat.
contact.subtitle: Punya pertanyaan atau saran? Kami siap membantu
contact.formDesc: Isi formulir dan kami akan membalas sesegera mungkin
contact.beforeContactDesc2: di mana Anda dapat menemukan jawaban untuk pertanyaan yang paling umum.

rules.title: Aturan dan Ketentuan Penggunaan
rules.subtitle: Ini adalah ruang khusus dewasa. Dengan mengakses, Anda mengonfirmasi bahwa Anda berusia di atas 18 tahun dan setuju untuk mematuhi aturan berikut yang dirancang untuk memastikan lingkungan yang aman, hormat, dan profesional.

respect.title: Rasa Hormat dan Hidup Berdampingan
respect.description: Kami memperlakukan semua orang dengan martabat dan rasa hormat. Segala bentuk diskriminasi, pelecehan, penghinaan, atau perilaku bermusuhan terhadap pengguna lain dilarang keras.
details: Komentar menyinggung berdasarkan identitas gender, orientasi seksual, etnis, agama, atau kebangsaan tidak akan ditoleransi
Pelecehan, penguntitan, atau intimidasi akan mengakibatkan larangan langsung
Kritik harus konstruktif dan tidak pernah bersifat pribadi
Hormati keputusan dan batasan setiap orang

adults.title: Konten Khusus Dewasa (+18)
adults.description: Situs ini khusus untuk orang berusia di atas 18 tahun (atau usia dewasa legal di yurisdiksi Anda). Dengan mendaftar, Anda bersumpah bahwa Anda memenuhi persyaratan ini.
details: Berbagi konten yang melibatkan anak di bawah umur dalam bentuk apa pun dilarang
Pemalsuan usia tidak diizinkan
Administrator dapat meminta verifikasi usia kapan saja

content.title: Konten yang Diizinkan
content.description: Semua konten harus terkait dengan tujuan forum: berbagi pengalaman, ulasan, dan layanan eskort profesional dengan cara yang hormat.
details: Spam, iklan tidak sah, atau promosi layanan eksternal tidak diizinkan
Posting yang mengandung konten ilegal menurut hukum internasional dilarang
Ulasan harus jujur dan berdasarkan pengalaman nyata
Permintaan atau penawaran layanan yang melanggar hukum tidak diizinkan

privacy.title: Privasi dan Data Pribadi
privacy.description: Kami melindungi privasi semua pengguna. Membagikan informasi pribadi pihak ketiga tanpa persetujuan mereka dilarang keras.
details: Jangan memposting nomor telepon, alamat, atau data pribadi orang lain
Jangan berbagi percakapan pribadi tanpa izin
Jangan mencoba mengidentifikasi atau melakukan doxxing terhadap pengguna lain
Gunakan area pribadi forum untuk informasi sensitif

safety.title: Keamanan Pribadi
safety.description: Keamanan Anda adalah prioritas. Kami merekomendasikan pertemuan yang aman dan tidak pernah berbagi informasi yang dapat membahayakan integritas Anda.
details: Selalu verifikasi identitas sebelum pertemuan langsung
Beri tahu seseorang yang Anda percaya tentang aktivitas Anda
Jangan berbagi informasi keuangan sensitif
Laporkan situasi yang mencurigakan atau berisiko

verification.title: Sistem Verifikasi
verification.description: Kami menawarkan sistem verifikasi sukarela untuk meningkatkan kepercayaan di komunitas. Pengguna terverifikasi memiliki akses ke area eksklusif.
details: Verifikasi bersifat rahasia dan data dilindungi
Profil terverifikasi mendapat lencana yang terlihat
Anda dapat meminta verifikasi kapan saja

legal.title: Kepatuhan Hukum
legal.description: Forum ini beroperasi sesuai dengan hukum yang berlaku. Tidak ada aktivitas ilegal yang diizinkan.
details: Perdagangan manusia atau segala bentuk eksploitasi dilarang
Layanan yang melibatkan narkoba atau zat ilegal tidak diizinkan
Kami mematuhi undang-undang perlindungan data (GDPR, CCPA)
Kami bekerja sama dengan pihak berwenang jika diwajibkan secara hukum

noExploitation.title: Toleransi Nol terhadap Eksploitasi
noExploitation.description: Kami memiliki kebijakan toleransi nol terhadap segala bentuk perdagangan manusia, eksploitasi, atau pemaksaan. Laporkan kecurigaan apa pun segera.
details: Laporkan tanda-tanda eksploitasi atau perdagangan
Posting pihak ketiga tanpa persetujuan yang dapat diverifikasi tidak diizinkan
Kami secara aktif bekerja sama dengan organisasi anti-perdagangan

discretion.title: Kebijaksanaan dan Kerahasiaan
discretion.description: Kami menghargai kebijaksanaan. Apa yang dibagikan di forum harus tetap di forum.
details: Jangan berbagi konten forum di media sosial tanpa izin
Hormati kerahasiaan pengguna lain
Tangkapan layar yang tidak sah dapat mengakibatkan larangan

reports.title: Laporan dan Moderasi
reports.description: Jika Anda menemukan konten yang melanggar aturan, segera laporkan. Tim moderasi kami meninjau setiap kasus secara rahasia.
details: Gunakan tombol laporan untuk konten yang tidak pantas
Laporan bersifat anonim dan rahasia
Laporan palsu juga akan dikenai sanksi
Anda dapat menghubungi moderator langsung untuk kasus mendesak

warning.title: Konsekuensi Ketidakpatuhan
warning.description: Pelanggaran terhadap aturan ini akan mengakibatkan tindakan yang mungkin termasuk: peringatan, penangguhan sementara, larangan permanen, laporan ke pihak berwenang (dalam kasus aktivitas ilegal), dan penghapusan semua konten terkait.

report.title: Report
report.description: Beri tahu kami mengapa Anda merasa konten ini melanggar pedoman komunitas.
report.detailsPlaceholder: Berikan detail lebih lanjut tentang masalah...
report.helpCommunity: Bantu kami menjaga keamanan komunitas. Pilih alasan laporan Anda.
report.reportSuccessDesc: Tim kami akan segera meninjau laporan Anda
report.successDesc: Thank you for helping keep the community safe

faq.title: Pertanyaan Umum
faq.subtitle: Temukan jawaban untuk pertanyaan paling umum tentang TransForo
faq.a1: Klik "Daftar" di kanan atas, isi formulir dan konfirmasi melalui email.
faq.a2: Buka bagian Verifikasi di profil Anda. Peninjauan 24-48 jam.
faq.a3: Akses ke area privat, lencana terlihat, kepercayaan lebih dan dukungan prioritas.
faq.a5: Demi keamanan, nama pengguna tidak dapat diubah.
faq.a6: Anda dapat mengirim pesan ke pengguna terdaftar melalui profil mereka.
faq.a7: Poin terkumpul dari aktivitas. Reaksi adalah cara berinteraksi dengan posting.
faq.a9: Di halaman login, klik "Lupa kata sandi?".
faq.a10: Status VIP diberikan kepada anggota terkemuka.
faq.notFoundDesc: Hubungi kami dan kami akan membantu

cookiesPage.title: Cookie Policy
cookiesPage.s1p: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They allow the site to "remember" your actions and preferences.
cookiesPage.s2p: TransForo uses cookies to improve your browsing experience, understand how you interact with our site, and personalize your experience.
cookiesPage.s31desc: These cookies are necessary for you to browse the site and use its basic features.
cookiesPage.s31note: ‚úì These cookies do not require consent under applicable law
cookiesPage.s32purpose: Purpose: Remember your preferences and personalize your experience
cookiesPage.s32desc: These cookies allow the site to remember your choices and provide enhanced features.
cookiesPage.s33purpose: Purpose: Understand how visitors use the site
cookiesPage.s33desc: These cookies collect aggregated and anonymous information about how visitors use the website.
cookiesPage.s4p: In some cases, we use cookies provided by trusted third parties:
cookiesPage.s4i1: Supabase: For authentication and database management
cookiesPage.s4i3: Analytics services: To understand user behavior
cookiesPage.s4note: These third parties have their own privacy policies.
cookiesPage.s5p: TransForo uses two types of cookies by duration:
cookiesPage.s5i1: Session cookies: Temporary, deleted when you close your browser.
cookiesPage.s5i2: Persistent cookies: Remain on your device for up to 1-2 years or until you delete them.
cookiesPage.s6p: You can manage or delete cookies according to your preferences.
cookiesPage.s61p: All modern browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings.
cookiesPage.s61i2: Accept only cookies from specific sites
cookiesPage.s61links: Links to cookie management instructions by browser:
cookiesPage.s62p: When you first visit TransForo, you'll see a cookie banner where you can accept or reject non-essential cookies.
cookiesPage.s7p: If you decide to block or delete cookies, some parts of the site may not work correctly:
cookiesPage.s7i1: You won't be able to stay logged in
cookiesPage.s7i2: You'll lose your language and theme preferences
cookiesPage.s7i3: Some personalized features won't be available
cookiesPage.s7i4: User experience may be negatively affected
cookiesPage.s7note: Note: Strictly necessary cookies cannot be disabled.
cookiesPage.s8p: Some browsers include a "Do Not Track" feature. We respect your privacy and work to improve our tracking practices.
cookiesPage.s9p: We may update this Cookie Policy occasionally. We recommend reviewing this page periodically.
cookiesPage.s10p: For more information about cookies and how to manage them, visit:
cookiesPage.s11p: If you have questions about our Cookie Policy, you can contact us through our
cookiesPage.summaryI1: ‚úì We use cookies to improve your experience
cookiesPage.summaryI2: ‚úì Some cookies are essential for site operation
cookiesPage.summaryI3: ‚úì You can manage cookies through your browser or our banner
cookiesPage.summaryI4: ‚úì We respect your privacy and comply with GDPR

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.s1p: At TransForo, we value and respect your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information.
privacyPage.s21p: When you create an account, we collect:
privacyPage.s23p: We store all content you publish:
privacyPage.s3items: Provide and maintain our service|Create and manage your account|Personalize your experience|Communicate with you|Moderate content|Prevent fraud|Improve our service|Comply with legal obligations
privacyPage.s4p: We process your personal information under these legal bases:
privacyPage.s4i1: Consent: You gave consent when registering
privacyPage.s4i2: Contract: Necessary to provide the service
privacyPage.s4i3: Legitimate interest: To improve and secure the platform
privacyPage.s4i4: Legal obligation: To comply with applicable laws
privacyPage.s5p: We do not sell your personal information. We may share information with:
privacyPage.s5i1: Other users: Your public profile and content are visible
privacyPage.s5i2: Service providers: Supabase, email services, analytics
privacyPage.s5i3: Legal authorities: When required by law
privacyPage.s6items: Password encryption|Secure HTTPS connections|Row Level Security in database|Two-factor authentication|Regular audits|Encrypted backups
privacyPage.s7p: We retain your information while your account is active or as needed.
privacyPage.s7note: You can request account deletion at any time.
privacyPage.s8note: To exercise these rights, contact us through our contact page.
privacyPage.s9p: We use cookies and similar technologies. See our Cookie Policy for details.
privacyPage.s10p: TransForo is intended for persons over 18 years of age.
privacyPage.s11p: Your data may be transferred to servers outside your country, complying with applicable laws.
privacyPage.s12p: We may update this Privacy Policy occasionally.
privacyPage.s13p: If you have questions, you can contact us through the
privacyPage.importantNote: This is a community for trans professionals. We treat your information with the utmost respect and confidentiality.

termsPage.title: Terms and Conditions
termsPage.s1p: By accessing and using TransForo, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions.
termsPage.s2p: TransForo is an online forum platform. We provide a space for:
termsPage.s2items: Sharing professional experiences|Connecting with colleagues|Exchanging information and advice|Building a supportive community
termsPage.s3p: To use certain features, you must:
termsPage.s3items: Be over 18 years old|Provide accurate information|Keep your password secure|Report unauthorized use|Accept responsibility for your account
termsPage.s4p: By using TransForo, you agree NOT to:
termsPage.s4items: Post illegal or abusive content|Impersonate another person|Violate intellectual property rights|Post spam|Interfere with site operation|Collect information without consent|Share personal information of others|Promote illegal activities
termsPage.s5items: You retain all rights to your content|You grant us a license to use your content on the platform|You are responsible for your content|You warrant you have the right to publish it|We may remove content that violates these terms
termsPage.s6p: TransForo allows clearly marked NSFW content. It must comply with applicable laws.
termsPage.s7items: Edit, delete, or reject any content|Suspend or terminate accounts|Modify or discontinue the service|Disclose information when required by law
termsPage.s8p: TransForo's design, code, and graphics are protected by copyright.
termsPage.s9p: TransForo is provided "as is" without warranties.
termsPage.s9items: The service will be uninterrupted|Defects will be corrected|The service will be virus-free|Results will be accurate
termsPage.s10p: In no event shall TransForo be liable for direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.
termsPage.s11p: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless TransForo.
termsPage.s12p: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time.
termsPage.s13p: You may terminate your account at any time. We may terminate or suspend your account for any violation.
termsPage.s14p: These terms shall be governed by applicable laws.
termsPage.s15p: If you have questions, you can contact us through the
termsPage.acceptanceNote: By using TransForo, you confirm that you have read, understood, and accepted these Terms and Conditions.

adminFilters.howFiltersWorkDesc: Filters automatically replace blocked content with the replacement text (default "xxx"). URL filters block links, word filters block specific terms.
